data.title: Delicious cupcakes
data.text:
Went there on an impromptu visit to the Fairfield area, and it was fantastic! If you need a chocolate peanut butter fix there is
A cupcake there that will do just the trick. Drink it with a tall glass of milk

data.title: Great food...expansion soon?
data.text:
Truffle Butta Bistro is a great little spot in Towson for upscale soul food. I had the Chicken & Sweet Potato Waffles which were delicious! My mom, cousin and I ate every bite. Our server was a young man who did an excellent job although you can tell he is new. 

On the downside, the actual space is tiny and on a Sunday afternoon, people were steadily coming in and the place started to feel super claustrophobic. Hopefully they will expand to a bigger spot in the near future. Branding goes a long way with new restaurants so my only suggestion would be that anyone working in the restaurant have an official Truffle Butta shirt so it doesn't look like people are just hanging out when they are actually working.

I will be back soon.

data.title: Wonderful Eclairs!
data.text: I was expecting to find truffles, but there aren't any! Instead I found these wonderful chocolate and strawberry eclairs. Their cookies are great too! I really liked the chocolate chips, but went because of the reviews on the PMS cookie. I wasn't impressed, but it was good!

data.title: Yummy for the Tummy
data.text: This has got to be my favorite sweet treat shop!  Always an assortment of pastries and cookies.. My favorite is the PMS cookie.  You have to try one.

data.title: This place has some of THE best cookies EVER
data.text:
I love, love, love, love this little neighborhood gem! The PMS Cookies are honestly AMAZING!  I buy them by the dozen and give them out to friends and co-workers! One co-worker now drives ALL the way from Oakland monthly to get her "fix". 
Love this spot!

Ladies of the Little Black Dress Club, East Bay

data.title: Soooo good!
data.text: This place is just the best bakery around.  The cupcakes are to die for.  My favorite is the champagne.  The PMS cookies and other treats are just amazing.  They are now serving lunch.  You will not be disappointed.

data.title: Great treats!
data.text: The eclair's are the best I've ever had and the cookies are awesome too! A nice little shop that is locally owned and operated. Keep the little guys going.

data.title: Cupcake Heaven
data.text: This place has sooooo many tasty goodies.  Cupcakes are moist and come in many varieties.  They also have other treats such as brownies, dipped fruit and cookies.  TRY THE PMS COOKIES!!!!!

data.title: What could be Better?
data.text:
A friend introduced me to this delightfully contemporary, yet homey establishment. It is beginning to blossom as the place to go for... well, anything. Coffee, snacks, luncheon, meeting venue, private parties. The owner is a bright and witty woman who is pouring her heart and soul into her prized venture. We were there for coffees, chatter AND Berry truffles.If I could have, I would have had one (or more) of each. So my suggestion is-one for on the spot-some to take home for later.
The choices of homemade cookies also abound. The most talked about, of course, is the PMS cookie. Again, my suggestion would be, If your guy is to shy then you order for him! Just the right combination of what we are all, always craving! Homemade goodness...

data.title: Scrumptious
data.text: My wife has been raving about truffle berries for months, so since I was in town for an interview I decided to pop on over to give them a try. There are several choices. I would recommend the champagne and the Boston Cream Pie. But you really cannot go wrong with any of the choices. They will soon be offering sandwiches and soup to their menu, I cannot wait for a return visit. Rating A+++

data.title: Truffle Berries
data.text: Truffle Berries is AWESOME!  I love their PMS Cookies.  Also, their homemade soups with tons of healthy veggies are delicious! My favorite is the corn chowder along with homemade bread.
